showAdditionalFields.description: This property allows you to define which fields should be shown in addition to the gift card number field

shouldBeEnabledForGuest.description: This property when enabled will allow gift cards balance check for guest users. This requires the anonymous access for gift cards to be also enabled on Headquarters

className.description: Provide a custom css class name defined in the theme pack to target the CSS for this module

clientRender.description: Enabling this property will cause the module to load its Javascript chunk and render on the client based on the user view port. This property is recommended for modules which are generally hidden below the users view port (lower on the page) to increase page load performance.

emptyInputError.comment: Error message for no gift card code entered
emptyInputError.value: Please enter a gift card number

invalidCodeError.comment: Error message for invalid gift card code entered

invalidCardInfoError.comment: Error message for invalid gift card information entered

invalidCardTypeError.comment: Error message for invalid gift card type
invalidCardTypeError.value: The gift card type is not supported

noCardPinError.comment: Error message for missing required gift card pin

noCardExpError.comment: Error message for missing required gift card expiration date
noCardExpError.value: Gift card expiration date is required

noBalanceError.comment: Error message for gift card has 0 balance
noBalanceError.value: Gift card has no balance left

giftCardPinPlaceholderText.comment: Text for gift card pin place holder

giftCardExpPlaceholderText.comment: Text for gift card expiratio date place holder

giftCardAlertLabel.comment: Gift card input fields alert label
giftCardAlertLabel.value: Your gift card may or may not include these fields

giftCardAvailableBalanceLabel.comment: Label about gift card entered with balance and giftCardIssueAmount

enteredGiftCardLabel.comment: Label about gift card entered with balance and giftCardIssueAmount
